location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 96 to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter discusses in detail the movements of two French ships, their capture of an English vessel and the subsequent reaction to these events. Developments from Persia are also reported in detail. The letter also discusses administrative issues and recent comings and goings from Bushire. Shipped by boat to Muscat.
